Manufacturing is still struggling, though. I think there is one bright spot there, which is capex. Spending has been ticking up. This is largely driven by, I would say, deflationary things like investing in hardware as it relates to AI. There is one bright spot there, but consumption is likely going to moderate the price conscious consumers. Goods are coming down in terms of price.
